name: I'm starting to wonder if I'm even in the right place.
./reveal:1/..Is that who I think it is?
What the hell is going on here?
Just be quiet before enemies spot us.
So do you know whats going on here?
Are those Scorpies? And are they attacking that Glyph?
Doesn't matter! They'll come after us next if we don't deal with them.
